title: Falafel City
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, International, Organic, Thai, Western, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Serves 2 different types of falafels - classic and sweet potato - with plenty of veggies and fresh sauces. Vegan sauces are labeled, as are sauces for nut allergies.
streetAddress: 255 Finchley Rd, The O2 Centre, Level 2
